trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Apparently, highly flammable fuel sources and exploding monsters are a bad combination.
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_TODO_00<tab>Survey the designated location and defeat any enemies that appear.
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_000<tab>Where's a hunter when you need one?
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_001<tab>Oh, hey there. Say, you seem like the wild critter-wrangling type. What do you say to a little honest work?
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_002<tab>You see, down by the ceruleum pits, we've got ourselves something of an infestation. Cerule bombs, to be precise.

TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_003<tab>Now, with them being the flame-spewing, explode-at-the-drop-of-a-hat sons of salamanders that they are, if even one got into our fuel supplies, this whole place would be blown sky-high!

TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_004<tab>Until recently, I've always had a hunter friend of mine keep their numbers down, but he's, ah...temporarily incapacitated. I was thinking you could take his place. If so, there's a whole bunch of them a little ways south from here. Good hunting!
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_005<tab>If you're having trouble finding them, just wait by one of the ceruleum pits, and they're sure to find <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var>!
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_007<tab>Are you kidding? They must've invited every damn bomb and his cousin to join the party! Sounds like you got there just in time.

TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_008<tab>Of course, culling them the old-fashioned way's risky work, and it ain't easy finding someone with the necessary skills. I guess we'd better come up with a better plan to keep them at bay.
TEXT_KINGZE007_05125_MAATSO_000_009<tab>In any case, you've done us all a good turn, friend. I just knew I'd picked the right <var 08 E905 ((gal)) ((guy)) /var> for the job!
